locations.name: Marcus's Master Bedroom
locations.description: Spacious master bedroom in a suburban Chicago two-story brick home. King-size bed with cream-colored duvet, dark walnut wooden headboard, nightstands, and matching dresser. Beige carpet flooring. Cream curtains on windows. Ceiling fan. Family photos on dresser. Warm, lived-in family home feel.
key_features: dark walnut wood furniture (headboard, nightstands, dresser)

lighting_conditions.early_morning: soft gray dawn light filtering through cream curtains
lighting_conditions.morning: warm golden light streaming through curtains
lighting_conditions.evening: warm lamp light, soft and cozy

variations: wide shot from foot of bed

locations.prompt_template: anime illustration, masterpiece, spacious master bedroom, king-size bed, cream duvet, dark walnut wooden headboard and furniture, beige carpet, cream curtains, ceiling fan, family photos on dresser, suburban American home, warm cozy atmosphere, detailed interior
locations.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, small room, messy, cluttered, modern minimalist, japanese style

locations.name: Marcus's Master Bathroom
locations.description: Spacious master bathroom with double vanity, granite countertop, large mirror with vanity lights. White tile floor, beige walls. Glass-enclosed shower with rainfall showerhead. Separate bathtub. Chrome fixtures. Beige towels on chrome bars.
key_features: large mirror with vanity lights (three bulbs)

lighting_conditions.morning: bright vanity lights, clean white illumination

locations.prompt_template: anime illustration, masterpiece, spacious master bathroom, double vanity, granite countertop, large mirror, three vanity lights, white tile floor, beige walls, glass-enclosed shower, rainfall showerhead, chrome fixtures, beige towels, clean modern suburban bathroom, detailed interior
locations.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, small bathroom, dirty, old, cramped, dark

ip_adapter_strength.notes: Maintain clean, modern suburban bathroom feel

locations.name: Marcus's Kitchen
locations.description: Spacious modern kitchen with dark wood cabinets, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances (large refrigerator, gas stove with range hood, microwave). Large center island with barstools. Well-lit with natural light from windows overlooking backyard. Family hub feel.

lighting_conditions.morning: bright natural light from windows, overhead lights on

locations.prompt_template: anime illustration, masterpiece, spacious American suburban kitchen, dark wood cabinets, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, large refrigerator, gas stove, range hood, large center island, barstools, window with backyard view, coffee maker, family kitchen, warm inviting atmosphere, detailed interior
locations.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, small kitchen, old appliances, cramped, dark, dirty, minimalist

ip_adapter_strength.notes: Maintain spacious family kitchen feel with suburban American style

generation_settings.model: Animagine XL 3.1 or equivalent anime SDXL model
generation_settings.notes: Generate 3 reference images per location with slight angle variations

usage_instructions.step_1: Generate location reference images using prompts above
usage_instructions.step_2: Review and select best images for each location
usage_instructions.step_4: Use selected references with IP-Adapter during scene generation
usage_instructions.step_5: Maintain consistency by using same references for all scenes in that location

notes.rationale: Faster iteration, focus on suburban Chicago African American family home aesthetic
notes.cultural_elements: Family photos, lived-in warmth, practical family spaces
